allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add physics system redesign document

Design for full physics pedestrians and road obstacles.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Implement physics system redesign for pedestrians and obstacles

- Add PedestrianPhysicsSettings with mass per pedestrian type
- Update PedestrianFactory to use dynamic Rigidbody \(not kinematic\)
- Create PedestrianForceMovementSystem for force-based crossing movement
- Update CollisionSettings with knockback parameters \(ForceMultiplier, LiftMultiplier\)
- Refactor PhysicsCollisionHandler with new knockback formula
- Simplify RagdollFeature \(force now applied by collision handler\)
- Add ObstacleComponents and ObstacleFeature for road obstacles
- Add documentation for Collision Layers and Obstacle Prefabs setup

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
